dimension: 8 1/16 x 1 1/2 x 1 in. (20.48 x 3.81 x 2.54 cm) (without fringe and tie)
medium: Animal hide, beads, metal bugle beads
title: Awl Case
description: blue, pink and white striped case with metal bugle beads attached to leather fringe; six large blue beads on tie; cover pulls back but is attached to case
